description: PXPALETTE files help artists manage color choices efficiently. Instead of manually selecting or recreating colors for each artwork or animation, users can save and load PXPALETTE files to maintain a consistent look. These palettes are especially useful for pixel art hobbyists, indie game developers, and designers working on game sprites, tilesets, or other assets that require a specific or limited color scheme.
